oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various performances - Jane Allen & The Hillsiders - 1946 - WHAS
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances of various tunes, as performed by Jane Allen (performer) & The Hillsiders, made up of Leslie Cobb (mandolin, vocals), Claude Cobb (guitar, vocals), and George Workman (fiddle), on an unidentified radio program in 1946 on radio station WHAS (Louisville, Ky.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jane Allen & The Hillsiders
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Test tones -- (01:09) Opening theme and statement (George [Unidentified]) -- (01:57) Kitty Clyde (Jane Allen & The Hillsiders) -- (03:21) George introduces Jane Allen, who introduces the next tune -- (03:47) Little Benny (Jane Allen & The Hillsiders) -- (06:22) George introduces the next tune -- (06:49) Precious Memories (Jane Allen & The Hillsiders) -- (09:00) George skips a commercial break, and introduces the Cobb Brothers, they introduce the next tune -- (09:25) Code Of The Mountains (Cobb Brothers) -- (11:25) George thanks the Cobb Brothers, and introduces the next tune -- (11:45) [Unidentified tune] (Jane Allen & The Hillsiders) -- (13:01) Closing statement and theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WHAS (Radio station : Louisville, Ky.);
